newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela Polar signs deal with Pepsi.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela Polar signs deal with Pepsi.

text.p: Powerful, privately-owned Venezuelan foods and beverage company Polar has signed a deal with U.S. soft-drinks giant Pepsi bottle and distribute Pepsi- cola in Venezuela from December, Polar said.
The agreement will be 70 percent controlled by Polar and 30 percent by Pepsi, Polar said in a press release.
